question:
What is the range of the dataset of numbers comprised entirely of {1, 6, x, 17, 20, y} if all terms in the dataset are positive integers and xy = 18?
(A) 16
(B) 17
(C) 18
(D) 19
(E) It cannot be determined from the information given.
